attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know he should say sorry for the economy as both former Chancellor and as PM, so let's petition him to. Post this link on all social networks you're part of and let's make it happen.

rejection.details: Please see the terms and conditions http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
